text: Kevyn Manuel Montaño Gasca (born April 6, 1995 in Nezahualcóyotl, State of Mexico) is a Mexican professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Cruz Azul. He made his professional debut for Cruz Azul during a Copa MX victory over Pachuca on 15 September 2015. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cruz Azul footballers Category:Cruz Azul Hidalgo footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Footballers from the State of Mexico Category:People from Nezahualcóyotl
title: Kevyn Montaño
